Token expired! Location permission altered! Location permission altered, please revert your permission to the previous value! upload
I you enable the saver after you start the procedure then it will stop and you either have to restart it and have the app unrestricted in the battery saver or disable battery saver and restart the procedure. To collect weather data you have to press the start button. Then it will run at certain times in the background to collect data. You have to have battery saver off or having the app unrestricted from battery saver. Next
Info Home
Language General Info Important Info for Chinese phones Info about battery
@string/general_info_title
@string/chinese_phone_info
Greek English
@string/english
@string/greek
The purpose of the app is to collect meteorological data to produce informative statistics. The collection occurs in the background at random intervals. To initiate the process, you need to press the button below to access the home activity. There, you should press the 'Start Weather Collection' button. You can stop the process at any time by pressing 'Stop' in the home activity. 

Important.

 If your device is a Chinese device, please refer to the important information regarding Chinese phones, as there are specific peculiarities regarding background operations.

If the battery saver (power saver) mode is enabled, the app will not collect data when the phone is idle. In case you are unfamiliar with battery saver, it is a feature that helps reduce battery consumption.
If you have a chinese phone, there are certain background limitations that differ from other phones. To ensure proper functionality of the app, you will be prompted to grant the 'AutoStart' permission. Once agreed, you will be redirected to the AutoStart settings where you need to locate the app's name and enable the permission specifically for this app. To return to the app, simply press the upper left arrow button. Since it's not possible to verify if the permission is enabled due to its limited usage on Chinese phones, the permission will be requested each time you open the main screen of the app. If you decline to grant the permission, the app will not operate in the background. 

 Additionally, you will be prompted to exclude the app from battery limitations imposed by your phone's battery saver. In case you're unfamiliar with battery saver, it helps reduce battery consumption. On Chinese phones, the default behavior of the battery saver is to terminate the app and any associated background processes when the phone is idle or when the app is removed from the 'recent apps' list. If you choose 'OK,' you will be taken to the battery settings specific to this app. From there, you can select 'Unrestricted' and press the upper left arrow to return to the app. Otherwise, the app will not operate in the background.
Since the app works in the background it may consume battery. So, it is recommended that you have normal levels of battery before you start the operation. If you have low battery, bellow 10%, then it will not run until it reaches beyond that level. Thus you can save your battery life when it is low. 

 If you have battery saver turned on, then the app wouldn’t work in the background. If you have it on and try to start the process of collecting data, then you will be requested to exclude the app from battery saver. If you agree, then the app will function correctly. 

 But be careful. If you don’t have it on and you open it the process of collecting will be terminated. If you want to resume you have to open the app and restart it by pressing the button in Home.
You have battery saver on. You can either press cancel(which will close the app) and remove the saver before reattempting to start the process or exempt the app from the saver by pressing OK.
Your phone has a battery saver that is different from conventional ones. By default it kills all processes when the app is closed(removed from resents) or when the phone is idle. The solution is to except the app from the saver.
By pressing OK you will be redirected to the battery settings where you must select unrestricted access for this app to work properly in the background. Activity Recognition Permission Altered! Activity Recognition permission altered.
Please revert your permission to the previous value! Location access is required! Number of collections: 0 Last time collecting: None Number of collections: Last time collecting: %1$s You have restricted background access to this app!
Please reconsider your previous decision, because the app cannot collect weather data.
Please lift the restriction in battery saver that you imposed on this app. Change Language Timeout error Please re-sign, the collection process was stopped! Collection process stopped To restart the collection open the app and start the process again. Alarm Perm removed Please open the app and give it back for the app to function. Start OR You entered wrong credentials! Please try again. The email address is already in use by another account. The given password is invalid. [ Password should be at least 6 characters ] Precise location is vital for collecting accurate weather data.
Please give permission for fine location. Welcome to the Weather Analysis App. The function of the app is to periodically access non-personal data from your device and send it to our server to produce meteorological statistics. For the app to function properly, a login is required to ensure a safe transaction between the app and our server. Please click BACK again to exit the app Confirm password Don't have an email account? Sign up now! Already having an email account? Log in now! Login Failed! Work ceased! Please restart the process. Work ceased! Please connect to the internet and restart the process. Please wait Cannot access current location Please try again
